author: Mark Shilo
comment: Sorry for the "hated it". I love the idea, but it simple doesn't even a show up on my LG urbane, even after re-synching. As soon as I can make it work I'll update my review!

author: Brent Papenfuss
comment: Says Hello Round World and then closes.

reply.author: Vieyra Software
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback. I have just updated the app and it now supports square and round smartwatches.

title: Force Close on Moto 360
